description: From Turkic, likely Ottoman Turkish قاورمه‎ (kavurma, “roasted meat”) (deverbal of قاورمق‎ (kavurmak, “roast; fry”)), via Persian قورمه‎ (qurme) and Urdu قورمہ‎ (qorma).

entries.meaning: A curry made from various spices especially coriander and cumin; and often with yoghurt sauce or nuts.
